'''Frost-Worn Space''' is an [[Event Domain]] during the [[Energy Amplifier Initiation]] [[Event]]. The [[Energy Amplifier]] is used during this domain.

==Location==
<gallery>
Domain Location Frost-Worn Space.png|Domain Location
</gallery>

==Ley Line Disorder==
When the [[Frostarm Lawachurl]]'s HP has dropped to a certain point, opponents known as [[Attendant]]s will appear and grant it several bonuses. Each Attendant will increase the Frostarm Lawachurl's Elemental RES and Physical RES by 10%. The Attendants will also heal it every 12s for 5% of its HP.

==Notes==
# The domain has a [[Pyro Monument]]/Totem, so it cannot be cleared without a Pyro character.

==Walkthrough==
